Test Name: Integrated Maternal Serum Screening (Specimen #1 – PAPP-A, NT)
Purpose: To assess the risk of fetal chromosomal abnormalities such as Down syndrome (Trisomy 21) and Trisomy 18 by measuring PAPP-A levels and integrating them with nuchal translucency data.
Container: Glass or plastic blood collection tube for plasma
Equipment: Centrifuge; immunoassay analyzer with PAPP-A assay kits; refrigerated storage (2-8 °C)
